Name: connect
Description: Connect this session to the given CollabServer

Name: create
Description: Create and join new data. Can't be done if data already loaded

Name: join
Description: Join an existing collaboration on a data

Name: leave
Description: Leave the current data you are working on (Still exists for other collaborators)

Name: info
Description: Display current session info such as connection status and number of collaborators

Name: help
Description: Display all available commands or display help for a specific command

Name: askgod
Description: Ask god if you are ugly

Name: edgeAdd
Description: Add an edge between two vertex. Create the vertex if doesnâ€™t exist

Name: edgeRemove
Description: Remove an edge going from source to destination

Name: attributeAdd
Description: Add an attribute and its value to a vertex

Name: attributeSet
Description: Set value of vertex attribute. Create any missing element if doesn't exists

Name: vertexAdd
Description: Add a new vertex to the graph

Name: vertexRemove
Description: Remove this vertex from the graph

Name: vertexInfo
Description: Display the information about a vertex

Name: vertexList
Description: Display a list of all vertex in the graph
